description: Returns drift information for the resources that have been checked for drift in the specified stack. This includes actual and expected configuration values for resources where CloudFormation detects configuration drift. For a given stack, there will be one StackResourceDrift for each stack resource that has been checked for drift. Resources that haven't yet been checked for drift aren't included. Resources that don't currently support drift detection aren't checked, and so not included. For a list of resources that support drift detection, see Resource type support for imports and drift detection. Use  DetectStackResourceDrift to detect drift on individual resources, or  DetectStackDrift to detect drift on all supported resources for a given stack.

parameters.name: StackName
parameters.description: The name of the stack for which you want drift information.

parameters.name: StackResourceDriftStatusFilters
parameters.description: The resource drift status values to use as filters for the resource drift results returned. DELETED: The resource differs from its expected template configuration in that the resource has been deleted. MODIFIED: One or more resource properties differ from their expected template values. IN_SYNC: The resource's actual configuration matches its expected template configuration. NOT_CHECKED: CloudFormation doesn't currently return this value. (string) ---

nested_items.name: StackResourceDrifts
nested_items.description: Drift information for the resources that have been checked for drift in the specified stack. This includes actual and expected configuration values for resources where CloudFormation detects drift.

nested_items.name: StackId
nested_items.description: The ID of the stack.

nested_items.name: LogicalResourceId
nested_items.description: The logical name of the resource specified in the template.

nested_items.name: PhysicalResourceId
nested_items.description: The name or unique identifier that corresponds to a physical instance ID of a resource supported by CloudFormation.

nested_items.name: PhysicalResourceIdContext
nested_items.description: Context information that enables CloudFormation to uniquely identify a resource. CloudFormation uses context key-value pairs in cases where a resource's logical and physical IDs aren't enough to uniquely identify that resource. Each context key-value pair specifies a unique resource that contains the targeted resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The resource context key.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The resource context value.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of the resource.

nested_items.name: ExpectedProperties
nested_items.description: A JSON structure containing the expected property values of the stack resource, as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters.

nested_items.name: ActualProperties
nested_items.description: A JSON structure containing the actual property values of the stack resource.

nested_items.name: PropertyDifferences
nested_items.description: A collection of the resource properties whose actual values differ from their expected values. These will be present only for resources whose StackResourceDriftStatus is MODIFIED.

nested_items.name: PropertyPath
nested_items.description: The fully-qualified path to the resource property.

nested_items.name: ExpectedValue
nested_items.description: The expected property value of the resource property, as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters.

nested_items.name: ActualValue
nested_items.description: The actual property value of the resource property.

nested_items.name: DifferenceType
nested_items.description: The type of property difference.
ADD: A value has been added to a resource property that's an array or list data type.
REMOVE: The property has been removed from the current resource configuration.

nested_items.type: as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters
nested_items.description: NOT_EQUAL: The current property value differs from its expected value (as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters).

nested_items.name: StackResourceDriftStatus
nested_items.description: Status of the resource's actual configuration compared to its expected configuration.
DELETED: The resource differs from its expected template configuration because the resource has been deleted.

nested_items.type: as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters
nested_items.description: MODIFIED: One or more resource properties differ from their expected values (as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters).
IN_SYNC: The resource's actual configuration matches its expected template configuration.
NOT_CHECKED: CloudFormation does not currently return this value.

nested_items.name: Timestamp
nested_items.description: Time at which CloudFormation performed drift detection on the stack resource.

nested_items.name: ModuleInfo
nested_items.description: Contains information about the module from which the resource was created, if the resource was created from a module included in the stack template.

nested_items.name: TypeHierarchy
nested_items.description: A concatenated list of the module type or types containing the resource. Module types are listed starting with the inner-most nested module, and separated by /.

nested_items.name: LogicalIdHierarchy
nested_items.description: A concatenated list of the logical IDs of the module or modules containing the resource. Modules are listed starting with the inner-most nested module, and separated by /.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the request doesn't return all the remaining results, NextToken is set to a token. To retrieve the next set of results, call DescribeStackResourceDrifts again and assign that token to the request object's NextToken parameter. If the request returns all results, NextToken is set to null.
